name: thousand-arrows
flavor_text: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Grounds the target until it leaves battle.  Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect_text_simple: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
